name: ClimbUs Engineering
overview:
Climbus Engineering came into existence as a sole proprietorship firm in Chennai ,Tamil Nadu, India in the year 2011.

Products & Services: Aluminium Extension Ladders Aluminium Tubular Ladders Aluminium Truck Ladders Aluminium Support Ladders Aluminium Airport Ladders Aluminium Three Step Ladders Aluminium Movable Ladders Self Support Extension Ladders

Infrastructure: With the assistance of our fully equipped infrastructure, we have been able to meet the demands of our valued clients. Latest techniques and advanced machines are installed at our production unit, which help us in bringing forth a quality approved range of products.

Our Clients: Our main aim is to assist the clients with products which are of great utility to them. Our every endeavor is in this direction, we try our level best to meet all the demands of our customers on time. We take up job work, which need particular specification from our clients, to meet their specific need.

Our Team: We have a very clear vision in mind and that is to meet the demands of clients with no compromise on quality. To meet our demand we have kept highly skilled and professional people who know there work very well and have an attitude of performing consistently. We offer employment only once the credentials of a person get verified.

Why Us?: We are proud to have succeeded in winning faith of people in a very short span of time. We owe this to our quality manufacturing of products. Clients satisfaction is always on mind, thus a huge range is on offer for clients to choose from and a liberty to pay through number of easy payment options. Delivering consignment always on time is a promise that we make and fulfill every time.
